metadata.title: CVE-2019-10231 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: Teclib GLPI before 9.4.1.1 is affected by a PHP type juggling vulnerabilityallowing bypass of authentication. This occurs in Auth::checkPassword()(inc/auth.class.php).

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
